docs: Create a new PodMedia contract.
name: new

docs: Event emitted a Media event is emitted
events.name: PodMediaEvent

docs: Event emitted a PodMedia contract is initialized.
events.name: ContractInitialized

docs: Event emitted a PodMedia is created.
events.name: PodMediaCreated

docs: Event emitted when Media Registered
events.name: MediaRegistered

docs: Event emitted when Media Uploaded
events.name: MediaUploaded

docs: initiatePodThis - function allow user to initiate a Pod
* `is_investing` - Boolean saying if it is an investing pod/
* `token_name` - Name of Funding Token
* `token_symbol` - Symbol of Funding Token
* `funding_target` - Target that the pod aims to raise
* `funding_token` - Funding Token
* `funding_token_price` - Price of pod token during funding phase
* `funding_date` - Timestamp of limit date to raise funds
* `amm` - Type of AMM to use
* `spread` - Spread charged on Trading Phase
* `max_price` - Max price that the pod token may have
* `max-supply` - Max supply of pod tokens to be released
* `medias` - list of media for the Media Pod
For handling percentages (like collabs parts)  we use u32 or  Integer  the range will be
name: initiate_pod

docs: This function allow a user to register a media.
registerMedia: this function is used to set the parameters of the media. Once the parameters are fixed, cannot be changed anymore.
Requester: Public address of the caller (should be pod creator)
PodAddress  Adress of the POD
MediaSymbol:  Symbol of the Media to update
ReleaseDate:  Timestamp of the release of the media
FundingToken: Token accepted to view the media
Royalty:  Royalties that goes to the creators
Price:      Price of each streaming media
PaymentType:  Type of asset streaming (fixed or dynamic)
TokenReward:  Rewards given for watching the media
TokenEntry:  Tokens for exclusive acess to the media
Collabs: Collaborators of the media + allocations
For handling percentages (like collabs parts)  we use u32 or  Integer  the range will be
name: register_media

docs: uploadMedia: this function is called to upload Media.
MediaSymbol             string                // Id of the media uploaded
PodAddress              string  			  // Id of the POD
name: upload_media

docs: investPod: this function is called when a Media is sold.
PodAddress: Address of the POD
Amount:  Amount of tokens to invest (in Funding Token)
name: invest_pod

docs: buyPodTokens: this function is called to buy pod tokens
PodAddress  Address of the POD
Amount of pod tokens to buy
name: buy_pod_tokens

docs: sellPodTokens is called to sell pod tokens
PodAddress:	Address of the POD
Amount:	Amount of pod tokens to sell
name: sell_pod_tokens

docs: get_media: this function is called to get a Media.
requires a media_symbol
name: get_media

docs: getMediaOfPod retrieves all the media of a given Pod
It takes as input the address for the pod.
name: get_media_of_pod

docs: get_pod_info:  retrieve a pod_information.
pod_address
name: get_pod_info

docs: getPodInfo returns the information of a given pod.
It takes as input the address for the pod.
name: get_pod_state

docs: getPodTokenPrice is called to get the market price of a pod token
PodAddress	string	Id of the POD
name: get_pod_token_price

docs: getPodPoolOfToken returns the pod address given the token_symbol
name: get_pod_pool_of_token

docs: getPodTokenPriceBySymbol: this function is called to get the market price of a pod token
TokenSymbol	string	Symbol of the pod
name: get_pod_token_price_by_symbol
